title: Measurement in the metal working industry. No. 2. Micrometer
creator_credit: United States. Office of Education and Loucks and Norling Studios
brief_description: An explanation of the basic principles on which the micrometer works: correct care, use and maintenance of a micrometer; the various types of micrometers developed to measure outside lengths, inside lengths and depths.
